message.body: ￼￼Hi!!! I am not ignoring you I just have a painting show coming up ASAP at the Crane and I'm freaking out and have models posing for me 24/7 so I haven't been alone at all the past few days but I'll call you tomorrow and hopefully you'll be free too! How are you!?? Can't wait to hear your voice soon!
PS do you spy the nod to the Hockney plant lolol
(When are best times to call you tomorrow, if tomorrow works for you !??)
Ingrid!!!!!!!! They are wonderful!!!!!!!!! Congratulations!!!!I am around today-off in fact. Call any time. After 9 am is probably best. These are fantastic paintings. I cannot wait to see them!
